borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T7. London Plane (Platanus X hispanica) Minor pruning to provide 3m clearance over riverside path; T9. Purple Plum (Prunus cerasifera nigra) Remove deadwood and reduce height by approximately 1m; T16. Mimosa (Acacia dealbata) Remove one basal stem and lateral branches to provide 0.5m clearance to wall; T23. Purple Plum (Prunus cerasifera nigra) 20% crown reduction, reduce height by approximately 1m in all directions, apart form to north west, where remove low hanging limb back to fork at 3.5m above path - to reduce stress on main stem; T29. Leyland Cypress (Cupressus x leylandii)  Remove to prevent competition and blocking of views in the future; T30. Birch (Betula pendula) Reduce height by approximately 4.5m to improve shape and reduce risk of future breakout; T32. Leyland Cypress (Cupressus x leylandii) Remove to prevent competition and blocking of views in the future;T50. Purple Plum (Prunus cerasifera nigra) Crown reduction - Reduce height by approximately 1m, crown spread towards building by approx. 1m. Lift canopy to provide 2.5m over pavement.
